Content.Text: <NAME_UNKOWN><MYNAME>. Good morning.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. I am a Harvest Sprite, one
who dwells in the Earth. My name is
<BLUE>Aaron</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I've protected this town, along with my
sister, for a long time. So I thought it
was time to meet.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've heard my voice before somewhere,
have you?
<PAGE>
Of course you have! I'm the one who gave
you a little push when it came to 
helping Dunhill out.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You passed by just as I needed you,
actually. Excellent timing.
<PAGE>
Regular folk can't see us, so I was in a
bit of a pickle!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're special, <MYNAME>. The Harvest
Goddess, who also lives in the Earth,
has blessed you. That's why you see us!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now I'll introduce you to my sister.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll have to transport you by magic.
Here we go!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Heh heh, did I surprise you? That's
nothing for a Harvest Sprite like me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you hit these two big trees with a
hammer lots of items will fall down!
<PAGE>
There's a trick to it. Take a look at
the base of the tree.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can you see the damaged part on the
trunk? Nothing will fall unless you hit
that bit.
<PAGE>
You can only hit a tree once per day, as
well. Make sure you hit it every day
and collect a load of items!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's all I've got to say about the
giant trees. Now I'll take you to meet
my sister, another Harvest Sprite.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll have to transport you by magic.
Here we go!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey! Sister, where are you? Come on out!

<NAME_UNKOWN>Enough noise, already! I'm coming, no
need to shout the place down!
<NAME_UNKOWN>Oh no, I can't stop! Waaaaah!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Hoh hoh hoh hoh! I'm <BLUE>Alice</BLUE>, a Harvest
Sprite.
<PAGE>
You're <MYNAME>, are you? And what might
you be doing over there?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You sent <MYNAME> flying, sis! Not a very
nice way to say hello!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
D-Don't blame me! It's <MYNAME>'s fault
for not getting out of the way.
<PAGE>
Like I said, it's totally not my fault!
Now get over here!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gah, you took your sweet time! I've got
things to do, you know?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry. We hurried as best we could.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Oh? You're going to make excuses now?
Is that it?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I-I'm sorry...

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Forget it. I forgive you.
<PAGE>
You can make it up to me by explaining
about these <RED>stumps</RED>, though. The
whole explanation.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What! All of it?

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yup! You got some kind of complaint?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...No. I'll explain everything.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, we've been instructed by the
Harvest Goddess to explain these <RED>stumps</RED>
to you.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
A stump like this one! This one here!
You'd better listen carefully 'cos this
stuff is pure gold!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll start the explanation.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As you may already be aware, there are
a number of places around Echo Village
that are still blocked off to you.
<PAGE>
However, you'll need to access these
areas in order to fully revitalize the
town.
<PAGE>
Another however, however! You can't just
use a hammer to smash your way through
into these locations.
<PAGE>
That's where Sound Stumps come in! The
blockages can be removed by using these
stumps to play the correct notes!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can play notes by hitting them with
a hammer. The red stump plays <RED>do</RED>, the
orange <ORANGE>re</ORANGE>, the yellow <Y_GREEN>mi</Y_GREEN>, the green <GREEN>fa</GREEN>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The light blue stump plays <L_BLUE>so</L_BLUE>, the blue
play <BLUE>la</BLUE>, the pink plays <PINK>ti</PINK> and the
purple plays a higher pitched <PURPLE>do</PURPLE>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just making a noise isn't going to break
down the blockages, however.
<PAGE>
You need to play the correct melody in
order to break these barrier down.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The correct melodies are written on this
sheet music I have right here.
<PAGE>
If you play the correct melody in the
correct location, you will be able to
proceed!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
However, we aren't going to have much
fun if we just show you the music right
off the bat, are we!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, I've just had a great idea!
<PAGE>
I'm going to hide a piece of sheet
music. You'll have to find it!
<PAGE>
Do so, then play it correctly, and
I'll hide the next piece for you!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Sis, I think we are meant to be helping,
not playing games.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whatever do you mean? That wouldn't
be any fun. Right, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
As this is the first one I'll be kind
and give you a hint about where I'm
going to hide it.
<PAGE>
The hint is <RED>the house of an old man </RED>
<RED>who wears a hat</RED>.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew! We're finally finished talking!
That went on forever!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You didn't do much, sis...

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's not get into that again! Who
cares!
<PAGE>
Okay, <MYNAME>. If the weather is nice
then you'll be able to find us here.
Come and see us any time!
<PAGE>
Don't forget to bring us something nice.
Find all that sheet music, too!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You can check everything I've just told
you about from your <BLUE>bookshelf</BLUE>. Check it
out if anything is unclear.
<PAGE>
We'll catch you later, <MYNAME>! Work
hard!
